Verses: 1 karththaave, Neer En Vazhakkaaligalode Vazhakkaadi, Ennodu Yuththampannugiravargalode Yuththampannum.
2 neer Kedagaththaiyum Parisaiyaiyum Pidiththu, Enakku Oththaasaiyaaga Ezhundhu Nillum.
3 ennaith Thunbappaduththugiravargalodu Edhirththunindru, Eettiyaiyongi Avargalai Mariththu: Naan Un Ratchippu Endru En Aaththumaavukkuch Sollum.
4 en Piraananai Vaangaththedugiravargal Vetkappattuk Kalanguvaargalaaga; Enakkuth Theenguseyya Ninaikkiravargal Naanamadaivaargalaaga.
5 avargal Kaatrumugaththil Parakkum Padharaippolaavaargalaaga; Karththarutaiya Thoodhan Avarkalaith Thuraththuvaanaaka.
6 avargaludaiya Vazhi Irulum Sarukkalumaayiruppadhaaga; Karththarudaiya Thoodhan Avargalaip Pindhodaruvaanaaga.
7 mugaandharamillaamal Enakkaagath Thangal Valaiyaik Kuzhiyil Oliththu Vaiththaargal; Mugaandharamillaamal En Aaththumaavukkup Padukuzhi Vettinaargal.
8 avan Ninaiyaadha Azhivu Avanukku Varavum, Avan Maraivaai Vaiththa Valai Avanaiye Pidikkavunkadavadhu; Avane Andhak Kuzhiyil Vizhundhu Azhivaanaaga.
9 en Aaththumaa Karththaril Kalikoorndhu, Avarudaiya Ratchippil Magizhndhirukkum.
10 sirumaippattavanai Avanilum Balavaanudaiya Kaikkum, Sirumaiyum Elimaiyumaanavanaik Kollaiyidugiravanudaiya Kaikkum Thappuvikkira Umakkoppaanavar Yaar Karththaave, Endru En Elumbugalellaam Sollum.
11 kodumaiyaana Saatchigal Ezhumbi, Naan Ariyaadhadhai Ennidaththil Ketkiraargal.
12 naan Seydha Nanmaikkup Badhilaagath Theemaiseygiraargal; En Aaththumaa Thikkatruppogap Paarkkiraargal.
13 avargal Viyaadhiyaayirundhapodhu Irattu En Uduppaayirundhadhu; Naan Ubavaasaththaal En Aaththumaavai Ubaththirappaduththinen; En Jebamum En Madiyile Thirumbavandhadhu.
14 naan Avanai En Sinegidhanaagavum Sagodharanaagavum Paaviththu Nadandhukonden; Thaaikkaagath Thukkikkiravanaippol Dhukkavasthiram Thariththuth Thalaikavizhndhu Nadandhen.
15 aanaalum Enakku Aabaththundaanapodhu Avargal Sandhoshappattuk Koottankoodinaargal; Neesarum Naan Ariyaadhavargalum Enakku Virodhamaaik Koottankoodi, Oyaamal Ennai Nindhiththaargal.
16 appaththirkaaga Ichchagampesugira Pariyaasakkaararode Serndhukondu Enperil Parkadikkiraargal.
17 aandavare, Edhuvaraikkum Idhaip Paarththukkondiruppeer? En Aaththumaavai Azhivukkum, Enakku Arumaiyaanadhaich Singakkuttigalukkum Thappuviyum.
18 magaa Sabaiyile Ummaith Thudhippen; Thiralaana Janangalukkulle Ummaip Pugazhuven.
19 veenaai Enakkuch Saththurukkalaanavargal Ennimiththam Sandhoshiyaamalum, Mugaandharamillaamal Ennaip Pagaikkiravargal Kan Simittaamalum Iruppaargalaaga.
20 avargal Samaadhaanamaaip Pesaamal, Dhesaththile Amaidhalaayirukkiravargalukku Virodhamaai Vanjagamaana Kaariyangalaik Karudhugiraargal.
21 enakku Virodhamaagath Thangal Vaayai Virivaaith Thirandhu, Aa Aa, Aa Aa, Engal Kan Kandadhu Engiraargal.
22 karththaave, Neer Idhaik Kandeer, Mavunamaayiraadheyum; Aandavare Enakkuth Dhooramaagaadheyum.
23 en Dhevane, En Aandavare, Enakku Niyaayanjeyyavum En Vazhakkaith Theerkkavum Vizhiththukkondu Ezhundharulum.
24 en Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Ummudaiya Needhiyinpati Ennai Niyaayam Visaariyum, Ennaikkuriththu Avargalai Magizhavottaadhirum.
25 avargal Thangal Irudhayaththile: Aa Aa, Idhuve Naangal Virumbinadhu Endru Sollaadhapadikkum, Avanai Vizhungivittom Endru Pesaadhapadikkum Seyyum.
26 enakku Neritta Aapaththukkaagach Sandhoshikkiravargal Egamaai Vetki Naani, Enakku Virodhamaaip Perumai Paaraattugiravargal Vetkaththaalum Lachchaiyaalum Moodappadakkadavargal.
27 en Needhivilanga Virumbugiravargal Gempeeriththu Magizhndhu, Thamadhu Oozhiyakkaaranudaiya Sugaththai Virumbugira Karththarukku Magimai Undaavadhaaga Endru Eppodhum Sollakkadavargal.
28 en Naavu Umadhu Needhiyaiyum, Naalmuzhudhum Umadhu Thudhiyaiyum Sollikkondirukkum.
